## EXISTING STRUCTURES

## ERROR TIPS
### Inventory full when harvesting
- Ensure the agent's inventory has sufficient space before attempting to harvest resources.

### Could not extract due to missing entity or invalid location
- Verify that the target entity exists at the specified coordinates and contains the requested item before attempting to extract. In this case, the agent is trying to extract iron-plate from (0.0, 0.0), but there is no valid entity containing iron-plate at that location.

## NAMESPACE
